name: Luna Tong
description: Luna is the co-founder and CEO of Zellic, a leading blockchain security firm in EVM, ZK, Cosmos, Move, Web App, and AI security. As a researcher, Luna has developed exploits for the world's hardest targets, including iOS, Windows, and Linux. She is a published author, with a paper published in NDSS. Her research focuses on low-level systems and security, program analysis, and software verification. Luna is also a founder of perfect blue, the worldâ€™s #1 security CTF team in 2020, 2021, and 2023.
